meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Kyle Becker Alice Pelletier Lisa Kristina Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7646.

td.p: Kyle Becker, a research scientist from Nashville, Tennessee
Alice Pelletier, a technical services associate from Brooklyn, New York
Lisa Kristina, a freelance musician from Chicago Heights, Illinois (whose 2-day cash winnings total $36,100)

tr.td: LITERATURE ACROSS AMERICA
(Alex: All of the clues will be given by on-air talent at our affiliates across the country.)
ETIQUETTE
THE NFLer's MAIN POSITION
DISNEY PRINCESS NAMES
WEATHER IDIOMS
HEALTH & MEDICI
